data.persona: I need a new cushion for this throne! All this chatter in court is giving me a headache!  That Lord that just walked past offended my nose with his odor.  I need to find my chambermaid.
data.description:
You are in the castle exit.
A beautiful, large door at the end of the hallway. Many framed pictures of past residents and royalty are hung on the brick walls. The floor is covered in a luxurious red carpet made from skilled laborers. There are many guards at the exit door preventing people from entering and checking for suspicious people
There's a hat and a footstool here.

You are carrying a book, and wearing a dress.

data.short_motivation: I want to look presentable to go to the cushion maker.
data.mid_motivation: I want to order a new cushion.
data.long_motivation: I want to have the most comfortable throne room in all the kingdom.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give book on cushions to cushion maker
